data.comment: The match is underway in Nashville.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Nashville.
Throw-in for Houston in the half of Nashville.
Throw-in for Houston close to the penalty box.
In the minute 8, Rubiel Vazquez signals a Houston throw-in in Nashville's half.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, Daniel Rios (Nashville) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Houston to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
Ariel Lassiter for Houston drives towards goal at Nissan Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Houston.
In the minute 18, Houston have a goal kick.
Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Houston in the half of Nashville.
In the minute 23, Nashville are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Rubiel Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
In the minute 26, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Marko Maric.
Marko Maric has recovered and rejoins the match in Nashville.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Darwin Quintero gets his shot on target but fails to score for Houston.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 33, Nashville's Daniel Rios is whistled for offside at Nissan Stadium.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a Houston throw-in in Nashville's half.
Houston's Ariel Lassiter is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 35, Rubiel Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a throw-in for Houston, close to Nashville's area.
Houston's Memo Rodriguez gets in a shot on goal at Nissan Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 38, Free kick Nashville.
Throw-in Houston.
Throw-in for Houston at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 40, Houston are coming forward and Darwin Quintero gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Rubiel Vazquez awards Nashville a goal kick.
Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 41, Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Houston.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Houston.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Nashville to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
Rubiel Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Rubiel Vazquez blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team replace Alex Muyl with Derrick Jones.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a Houston throw-in in Nashville's half.
Nashville take a 1-0 lead thanks to Daniel Rios.
In the minute 49, Derrick Jones instrumental with a fine assist.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nashville.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
Attention is being given to Houstonâ€™s Victor Cabrera and play has been suspended briefly.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
In the minute 53, Houston's Victor Cabrera is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Throw-in Houston.
In the minute 55, Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Houston are pushing forward but Mauro Manotas's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 57, Houston have a goal kick.
Daniel Rios is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
In the minute 59, Anibal Godoy is replacing Brian Anunga for the home team.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
Daniel Rios (Nashville) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Alistair Johnston.
In the minute 61, Nashville have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Throw-in Nashville.
Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, In Nashville Houston drive forward through Darwin Ceren. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Houston to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 64, Hany Mukhtar of Nashville smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
In the minute 66, Houston drive upfield and Darwin Ceren gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nashville defender.
Houston's Darwin Quintero gets in a shot on goal at Nissan Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Gary Smith (Nashville) is making a fourth substitution, with Alan Winn replacing Jalil Anibaba.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Nashville Houston attack through Memo Rodriguez. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 70, Rubiel Vazquez awards Nashville a goal kick.
Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Houston's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nashville.
In the minute 74, In Nashville, Memo Rodriguez of Houston is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Memo Rodriguez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Houston.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 75, Adam Lundqvist (Houston) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Houston make their second substitution with Sam Junqua replacing Adam Lundqvist.
Tab Ramos is making the team's first substitution at Nissan Stadium with Nico Lemoine replacing Darwin Ceren.
In the minute 76, The home team have replaced Randall Leal with Taylor Washington. This is the fifth substitution made today by Gary Smith.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rubiel Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 78, Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Nashville.
Important block from the Nashville defence as Mauro Manotas fires in a strike for Houston.
Corner awarded to Houston.
In the minute 79, Houston have a dangerous throw-in.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Houston's Memo Rodriguez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nashville defender.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Houston.
Free kick for Nashville in the half of Houston.
Nico Lemoine is booked for the away team.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Throw-in Houston.
In the minute 84, Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Corner awarded to Houston.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Houston.
In the minute 89, Goal! Maynor Figueroa (Houston) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Nashville.
Great play from Darwin Quintero to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Houston.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Nashville.
Throw-in for Houston at Nissan Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a Houston throw-in in Nashville's half.
Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Houston's half?
Rubiel Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Boniek Garcia is replacing Darwin Quintero for Houston at Nissan Stadium.
